title: Commonwealth Review. No. 21
brief_description: Cinemagazine containing the following items: Ice breakers at work in the Gulf of St Lawrence; Asian students in New Zealand under the Colombo Plan; Adventure training for girls at Kenya’s Outward Bound School; Commonwealth students assist with testing spectographic analysis machines; The centenary celebrations of the Ballygunge Cricket Club in Calcutta; The Commonwealth stand at the Schoolboy’s Exhibition in London.
